title: [Epidemiology] School closures and lockdowns are the only interventions that reduced spread of COVID-19 in U.S. states, study finds. Limiting public events to fewer than 100 people had no effect. No state had an estimated Rt below 1.0 before lockdown, but 29 states reached an Rt below 1.0 after lockdown.
[Health] Inflammatory and hematologic markers as predictors of severe outcomes in COVID-19 infection: A systematic review and meta-analysis
